abstract: The technology companies were among some of his major investments.
snippet: The technology companies were among some of his major investments.
lead_paragraph: SAN FRANCISCO — Few men are as synonymous with the venture capital industry — the financiers who nurtured the likes of Apple, Google and Facebook — as Thomas J. Perkins, who died on Tuesday at the age of 84.

headline.main: 4 Tech Giants Nurtured by Tom Perkins

byline.original: By Michael J. de la Merced
